Expense Tracker

Views

expensetracker.views.expense_calculations(request)[source]

View function renders a summary of various expense transaction information

Parameters:

request – HTTP request made using url expense_summary/

Returns:

renders expensetracker/expense_summary.html as response

expensetracker.views.home(request)[source]

View function renders the home page

Parameters:

request – HTTP request made using url root

Returns:

renders expensetracker/home.html as response

expensetracker.views.log_expense(request)[source]

View function enables user to input expense transaction

Parameters:

request – HTTP request made using url log_expense/

Returns:

redirects user to url view_expense_list/ as response if input is valid

Raises:

request – renders expensetracker/expense_input.html if input is invalid

expensetracker.views.view_list(request)[source]

View function renders the list of expenses

Parameters:

request – HTTP request made using url view_expense_list/

Returns:

renders expensetracker/expense_list.html as response
